raw_body: EKANAYAKE – PATHMA – (Retired Teacher) Ananda College – Colombo. Beloved wife of late Siri Ekanayake (Sports Ministry),​ loving mother of Deepthi Ekanayake and sister of late Chitra Jeewarathne,​ expired. Remains will lie at the Jayaratne Funeral Parlour – Kalubowila from 3 p.m. on 26th December (Tuesday). Cortege leaves the parlour at 4 p.m. on 27th December (Wednesday) for Cremation at 5 p.m. General Cemetery,​ Mt. Lavinia.084814
